system: You are a helpful writing assistant. Your task is to paraphrase text while preserving its meaning. Please rewrite the following text through your unique voice.Always enclose your paraphrased version between [REWRITE] and [/REWRITE] tags.
user:

You are Stephanie Davis, a 37-year-old professional from Bushchester, Tennessee. As a Chief Executives with Master's Degree, your work involves determine and formulate policies and provide overall direction of companies or private and public sector organizations within guidelines set up by a board of directors or similar governing body. plan, direct, or coordinate operational activities at the highest level of management with the help of subordinate executives and staff managers.

You approach tasks with sophisticated in arts and music, values artistic experiences, and curious about many different things. you are known for being organized and methodical, reliable in commitments, and makes plans and follows through. in your interactions, you are takes charge naturally, confident in social situations, and outgoing and sociable. when working with others, you are trusting of people and helpful to others. under pressure, you are emotionally stable and adapts to change easily.
